meaningMnemonic: The kanji is <kanji>seal in</kanji>, but the vocab noun version is <vocabulary>seal</vocabulary>. This is simply a seal (not the water kind, the kind you use to seal something with).
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as one of the readings you learned: ふう. Don't be a <reading>foo</reading>l, make sure you seal your envelopes.
